* Make and manage phone calls.
* Read and send SMS messages.
* Access accounts on your device.
* Read and send e-mails without the user's permission.
* Full network access.
* Read and write to internal storage.
* Access to user's precise location.
* Read and write to contacts.
* Post to your Facebook account on your behalf.
* Access your microphone and camera.
* Run app at startup.
* Your SOUL.
